forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. West southwest wind 3 to 7 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 3 to 18 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the air carries a hint of coolness, framed by a thin veil of clouds. Temperatures have dipped to a comfortable 52, inviting a cozy embrace of light layers. The gentle west-southwest wind, a whisper of 3 to 7 miles per hour, stirs slightly, but does little to disrupt the serene calm of the morning. Today promises sunshine, with highs reaching around 66 and slowly giving way to the soft embrace of a cooler afternoon, perfect for those seeking refuge from the day’s warmth.

Looking out across the city, one may notice a delicate interplay between light and shadow, as the sun ascends, struggling initially against the remnants of a marine layer that clings to the coastline. Fog may linger just beyond the Golden Gate, hinting at the enigmatic charm that defines this city by the bay. Wrapped in layers, a walk along the waterfront would feel invigorating; perhaps meandering through Crissy Field, the Golden Gate Bridge standing proud against a backdrop of brightening blue skies. For those preferring the earthy comfort of a cafe, the day beckons with the promise of warmth and laughter among friends. Dress in layers, savoring the balance of coolness and sun, and set out to embrace the best that this vibrant city has to offer as it stirs awake.
